page.title: 18AT SCHOOL IN FELTWELL
page.content: At Feltwell School we learn Arithmetic, English, Geography, History, Science, Art, sometimes Drama, also P.E. and games, including netball, football, rounders and cricket. In Arithmetic we do number, fractions, decimals, measuring and tables. In English we do compositions, exercises and handwriting. Our school has a good reputation and most people like it but some do not. We have a canteen and you can buy school dinners for 60p, also lollies and ice cream. J3 children record the weather which includes barometer, weathercock, raingauge, temperature, humidity and cloud. We write it on a special board and put it in a book. In our school most children get on well with each other. Feltwell School does not have hooligans like some do.
